Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute at Madison/Rockwell
ShortDescription: 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Western, Jackson, California, and Madison due to, street blockage at Madison/Rockwell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Madison, Western, Jackson, California, and Madison due to, street blockage at Madison/Rockwell.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Southbound Reroute near South Chicago/71st
ShortDescription: SB 30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via South Chicago, 69th, Cottage Grove, and South Chicago due to, street blockage near South Chicago/71st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via South Chicago, 69th, Cottage Grove, and South Chicago due to, street blockage near South Chicago/71st.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th , #108 Halsted/95th, and #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute near 95th/Eggleston
ShortDescription: 95, 108, and 112 buses temp. rerouted via EB: 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette and 95th; WB: 95th, State,87th, Halsted, and 95th near 95th/Eggleston.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th , #108 Halsted/95th, and #112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near 95th/Eggleston.

Eastbound buses will operate via95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette and 95th.

Westbound buses will operate via 95th, State,87th, Halsted, and 95th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/48th
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 48th Place, Union, 47th, and Halsted due to, street blockage at Halsted/48th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 48th Place, Union, 47th, and Halsted due to, street blockage at Halsted/48th.

Allow extra travel time.
